item.title: About
item.description: I am a PhD student at the University of Liverpool. I am part of the CDT Data Analytics and Society. My PhD project is with Ordance Survey on exploring neighbourhood change in Great Britain. My focus is primarily on socioeconomic and built environment change and how they are interacting.
